name: 有 (Live)
lyric:
译：陈粒
音乐总监：荒井十一
制作人：荒井十一
编曲：冯翰铭 / 苏道哲
计算机编程：冯翰铭 / 苏道哲
鼓：荒井十一
钢琴 / 键盘：冯翰铭
吉他：顾忠山
贝斯：Damien Banzigou
大提琴：宋昭
音响设计：王凯
现场录音：王雷 / 赛汉
音乐编辑：倪涵文 / 李卓 / 李宗远 / 茆博文 / 荒井十一
混音：周天澈
母带处理：Joe LaPorta

No more shackles on my feet
No more agony
No more chasing chasing chasing after me

No more channel on the screen
No more book to read
No more stranger stranger stranger

I need to call mommy
Swing
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty

Swing
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty
Place of empty
No more shackles on my feet

No more agony
No more chasing chasing chasing after me

No more channel on the screen
No more book to read
No more stranger stranger stranger

I need to call daddy
Swing
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty

Swing
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty

Swing
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty
I'm in place of empty
